data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guntur, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Guntur who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 53,766 believers living in the county of Guntur. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Guntur.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Vakkaliga Gangadikara people. Make the Vakkaliga Gangadikara people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 53,766 believers in Guntur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Guntur, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the county of Guntur, Andhra Pradesh, India has a population of 4,887,800.

We estimate Guntur has 53,766 people who might know Jesus, 59,305 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,774,729 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 53,766 believers find a person of peace today among the 4,834,034 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
